meta_title: What is CapEx? Capital Expenditure Definition & Guide
meta_description: Define CapEx (Capital Expenditure) in an industrial context. Understand how fixed asset investments impact maintenance budgets and asset lifecycle management.
title: What is CapEx (Capital Expenditure)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is CapEx (Capital Expenditure)?

image_prompt: A wide-angle, photo-realistic shot of a modern, high-tech manufacturing floor in 2026. In the foreground, a diverse group of three industrial managers wearing clean PPE (hard hats, high-visibility vests, and safety glasses) are gathered around a large industrial tablet. The tablet displays a glowing 3D digital twin of a complex machine with financial charts overlaid. The background shows clean, well-lit production lines with robotic arms and advanced conveyor systems. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a high-capital, technologically advanced industrial environment.
